name: Zolanore
description:
Zolanore is an Action, Adventure, RPG game, which also has no real "ending" but the goal would be to fight the hidden boss. Level up as you kill enemies and spend points increasing your character stats. The game also features lofi-like music to immerse the user into the colourful environment.

Juma speaking - Any feedback about what I can improve about the core mechanics of the game would be great, I will be using this feedback in the future! Thank you very much!

This was a university project & I'm happy with how much I learned during the making of this, it was developed by the 3 of us below who are all a part of the same university semester.

Project Lead - Juma Abdulla

Developer - Ralph Roukoz

Audio - Joshua Iyer

Check out the credits scene within the game too! it looks very... interesting I would say, some might say it's eerie. Thanks for your time as always!

Small Notes & Controls

- Right click to hide/show mouse

- Sometimes the player can be stuck this can be fixed by pressing 2 / 3

- Scroll to zoom in & out / CTRL + Scroll to zoom in & out of minimap
